actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution relating to the need for prompt action on any decision for an acreage diversion program for the 1980 crops of wheat and feed grains.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Agriculture should announce promptly a decision on whether there will be an acreage diversion program in effect for the 1980 crops of wheat and feed grains.

titles.title: A resolution relating to the need for prompt action on any decision for an acreage diversion program for the 1980 crops of wheat and feed grains.
